title: Venue Selection
sub_title: The perfect setting for your celebration
description: City Gardens Banquet Hall is a spacious and elegant venue with indoor and outdoor spaces, offering the ideal ambiance for your special occasion. With a capacity of 200 guests, it's the perfect backdrop for your memorable day.

title: Invitation Card
sub_title: An elegant invitation to our special event
description: Our invitation card features an exquisite floral theme, inviting you to a sophisticated evening. RSVP by September 30, 2023, and join us in your finest semi-formal attire as we create lasting memories together.

title: Entertainment
sub_title: An evening filled with fun and excitement
description: Prepare for a night of entertainment extravaganza! Harmony Groove Band, DJ Beats, and engaging activities including dancing, a photo booth, and games await you. It's an evening you won't want to miss.

title: Food & Drinks
sub_title: Delight your taste buds with exquisite cuisine
description: Indulge in a culinary journey with Gourmet Delights Catering. Our carefully crafted menu features delectable appetizers, mouthwatering main courses, decadent desserts, and a selection of wines, signature cocktails, and soft drinks.

title: Photos & Videos
description: Relive the magic! Our team of professional photographers and videographers from SnapShot Studios and CineMagic Productions will ensure every special moment is captured in high definition. It will be available.

title: Custom Foods
description: Elevate your dining experience with a custom-designed cake from Custom Cake Creations, a true work of art. Pair it with our signature cocktail, 'Event Elixir,' crafted exclusively for this special day. It's a culinary journey like no other.
